short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save engineers time from endless manual en/decode/diff job.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A combine tool set of XML/Json format/diff, Base64/URL en/decode etc... 
Save engineers' time from endless manual en/decode/diff job.

Feature:
1. Float/Int type Number base conversion
2. Json/XML format & diff
3. Base64/URL encode & decode
